summary: COMPLETE TRANSMISSION FAILURE ON A 1999 DODGE GE AND CARAVAN VIN# [XXX] AT 67,723 MILES.  NO HELP FROM CHRYSLER ON THIS PROBLEM, BECAUSE OF HIGH MILEAGE.  TRANSMISSIONS SHOULD NOT FAIL THIS SOON.  WE HAD A TRANSMISSION FAILURE ON ANOTHER GRAND CARAVAN WITH VIN# [XXX] THAT HAD 37,491 MILES ON IT THAT WAS MOSTLY COVERED BY THEM.    THESE VEHICLES APPEAR TO HAVE DEFECTS AND SHOULD BE COVERED BY CHRYSLER AND BUILT TO LAST.  *JB      INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
